text: 64|9|jis din vah tumhen ekatr karega, ekatr kiye jaane vaale din. to vah kshati (haani) ke khul jaane[1] ka din hoga aur jo eemaan laaya allaah par tatha sadaachaar karata hai, to vah kshama kar dega usake doshon ko aur pravesh dega use aise svargon mein, bahatee hongee jinamen naharen, ve sadaavaasee honge unamen. yahee badee saphalata hai.
